content:
Hello! This is embarassing :scream: but I thought it best. The other day I accidentally pasted a link to a private gist into this public channel:

whops
sorry, that wasn't meant to be posted here :)

I quickly deleted the link (and, indeed, the gist) but I figure some people probably clicked on it before I did. If you did, would you mind sending me a private message? I'd like to discuss the contents with you. Thanks! :heart:
